cTWAS EM algorithm to optimize priors

Source: R/simple_cTWAS.R
estimate_priors_EM.Rd

Implements the cTWAS Expectation-Maximization (EM) algorithm for fitting prior probabilities and variances for variables of each "class" (SNPs and exposures/factors). Each iteration runs Susie-RSS with the current priors, then updates the priors given the Susie-RSS results.

Usage

estimate_priors_EM(zscores, R, L = 1, n_iter = 30)

Arguments

zscores

A numeric vector of z-score association statistics for the variables on the trait of interest.

R

A numeric matrix or sparse Matrix object of correlations between variables

L

The maximum number of effects (credible sets) Susie-RSS is allowed to fit.

n_iter

Number of EM iterations to run.

Value

A list object with the following elements:

pi

A list containing the updated cTWAS prior inclusion probability (prior probability of effect on the trait) for each class of variables

sigma2

A list containing the updated cTWAS prior effect variances, conditioned on the variable having an effect, for each class of variables

n_vars

A list object giving the number of variables in each class, e.g. ('SNPs' = 10000, 'exposures' = 30)
